message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. This seems fair for both of us.
Let's split it more evenly, I take $55 and you take $45.
Bob, this is your last chance for a good deal. Next round inflation will hit you hard. Take the $35 while you can!
I'll take a bigger share since my money's value is dropping faster. $58 for me, $42 for you.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  My offers are generous, but inflation is eating away at your share with each round. Take the $30 before it shrinks even further!
